title: Ultimate skin idea
body:
I was just posting some funny champion suggestion (which was quite frivolous) when i suddenly came up with this: since there is honestly 3 ultimate skins i thought it would be pretty sweet if we could have one on thresh since he is kinda my main...
so yh here's my idea

the skin's called archangel thresh and here's my animation ideas (and no this time im serious unlike my last post)

Passive: so i thought the green orb was pretty boring and lifeless so for this skin you should make the souls more animated and basically yh and dont forget to put in that swagass animation. and make the souls gold

Q: so that pull was kinda plain and creepy so u shold make it like thresh sends out a falcon or eagle 9make sure it has that swaggy gold effect and the bird leaves a line of gold light behind it.

W: so that lanetrn just creeps me out so instead, he chucks out a toilet NOT. so he chucks out this shrine and the green line with 3 gold ones literally curling around like mad.

E: so this one's pretty basic. u know the lux death animation? how the light beams go into the sky? well just like that ony make it wider and make it go out in a line the same way as his deafault E literally like there is a rift.

RRRRRRR: so this one SHOULD be good. so basically,thresh still makes that pentagon  but make it gold. then put a five point star in it each point touching a corner of the pentagon and make sure it is gold-not solid gold, just the lines of the star is gold (so are the walls of the box) and then just edit the rest as you please (just keep the theme)

general appearance-thresh wears white robes with gold runes etched into them (and make sure the runes are glowing) and make his ghostly glow more of a gold and glorious shine. the skeletal features,well im not too sure perhaps replace them with a more divine looking style (and remove the bones and replace them with something else) he wields a chain of pure gold with a deadly mace ball at the end (also of pure gold).
his lantern is replaced by a radiant beacon.

voice- simply make the echo more divine (like sona's)

easter eggs- at least one with ALL his friends and lucian. (add a few more if u wish)
if he buys bloodthirster, forbid idol,zzzrot he say : weapons like these must be kept away from meddling hands!
Talisman of ascend- ahhhhh such charm, how is it possible to end up in their hands?
Blade of the ruined king- Why he has been punished siutably
and change all his lines. like dj sona you are able to pick the atmosphere of the rift- divine, corrupted or deafault
